metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21913 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: International Components for Unicode (ICU-20850) v66.1 was discovered tocontain a use after free bug in the pkg_createWithAssemblyCode function inthe file tools/pkgdata/pkgdata.cpp.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
icu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
